summary: This mod is a standalone version of the female-only heavy armor I made for Lilith's Tools Compilation mod.
descriptionHtml:
[size=30]This mod has been remade ->[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50573/?]Lilith's Black Sun Armor[/url][/size]

Got problems, advice or ideas? Make a comment! All feedback is very welcome.

Lilith's Armor - Standalone Version
-------------------------------------------------

[youtube]JBIu3P0DxNM[/youtube]
[youtube]xrhrI7w15nw[/youtube]
Description:
------------------
*This mod is Female only except the hoods are for both genders*

This mod is a standalone version of the armor I made for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26335]Lilith's Tools Compilation mod[/url].
All the stats of the armor pieces are two points above daedric armor and are crafted with daedric smithing at a forge. The chestpiece for example requires 2 daedra hearts / 3 ebony ingots / ebony plate armor.

The mod contains Lilith's armor/gauntlets/boots, a heavy armor hood and a light armor hood. Both of these hoods are available as a "ghost"-version that doesn't show character's face.

*only the ghost versions work properly with argonian / khajiit*

Making this was surprisingly hard / annoying but it ended up being quite nice. I don't think it really lives up to the quality of my weapon mods but it's something :)

Installation:
----------------

The NMM should be working. If you install this manually, just dump everything inside the folder that's inside the rar, into the Data folder of your Skyrim.
author: wiikki
